H0.text: who won the oscar for best picture in 1976. All the President's Men

H1.text: who won the oscar for best picture in 1976. Network

H2.text: who won the oscar for best picture in 1976. Taxi Driver

H3.text: who won the oscar for best picture in 1976. Rocky

A4.text: Academy members indicated that, given a second chance, they would award the 1977 Oscar for Best Picture to All the President's Men instead of to Rocky.

A5.text: The February 2020 issue of New York magazine lists Taxi Driver as among 'The Best Movies That Lost Best Picture at the Oscars'.

A6.text: The film received ten Academy Award nominations and won three, including Best Picture.
